name: Sheraton Gateway Hotel Toronto Airport

reviews.text: I was on business at Toronto for a night and stayed here.
reviews.title: Ideal if your Work is in towns around Toronto

reviews.text: Positives:
reviews.title: Great Staff, Great Food, Amazing Stay with my 2 year old!

reviews.text: - To begin with, as it is directly connected to the airport, it makes it very convenient if you have work in the towns around Toronto as Airbuses are easily accessible. Plus direct connection to the terminals makes it easy to depart. In my case, after checkout, I left my luggage in the storage, finished my business for the day, came back, picked up luggage and headed for my flight. Very convenient. Though I didn't use the option, the hotel also has a very convenient late check out option with a $50 charge.
reviews.title: A good choise to stay overnight at Toronto

reviews.text: - I stayed at the Club Room. Room was spacious and clean. Television had a great choice of channels. Bathroom had all necessary amenities. Minibar had a good choice.
reviews.title: Perfect Airport Hotel

reviews.text: - Free WiFi in the room was stable and decent speeds.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay at the Sheraton Gateway

reviews.text: I was flying from Paris to New York for the weekend, with a short layover in Toronto. I got caught there in some very unfortunated situation preventing me from going any further and i had no other choice but flying back to Paris the following day. I was alone, exhausted, starving, pissed off and pretty shocked by what had just happened to me. So i decided to at least treat myself with a night at the Sheraton (wasn't in the mood to go on a mission downtown) and luckily i could experience first hand the world famous Canadian hospitality! Mega props to Rosario at the desk and Anthony at the Mahogany Bar who were so nice and helpful. Other than that, the hotel is your typical business/classy airport hotel, super comfy and clean bedroom, yummy breakfast at the 8th floor lounge, comfy couches in the lobby where i was able to kill time while waiting for my return flight (free wifi!), etc. I never meant to stay at the Sheraton but eventually i'm glad i did :)
reviews.title: Sheraton basically saved my otherwise totally ruined weekend!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Large, quiet room with extraordinarily comfortable bed. Hotel staff helpful and supportive. Located in the airport per se: immediate access to Terminal 3 and three minutes to Terminal 1. This hotel made a huge personal difference in turning a predawn, long-distance flight into a positive experience. It would have been nice to stay longer, but then there wouldn't have been the compulsion to stay there at all.
reviews.title: Oasis at the airport

reviews.text: We stayed overnight to catch an early flight to Nassau. The location is fantastic and is convenient for easily getting to your flight. Because this hotel connects to the airport you can eat here or at any of the airport restaurants.
reviews.title: Good choice for early flights

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was easy and the hotel was very quiet. I personally found the hallways to get to our room a little dark. There were sufficient light fixtures but the actual amount of light was quite dim.
reviews.title: Very Handy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I both used the gym which was great.
reviews.title: Good place to spend your airport layover

reviews.text: Good location for obvious reasons. I was concerned because we right at the airport, but the rooms were quiet.
reviews.title: Convenient place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff was friendly and courteous. The 8th floor offered a preferred lounge which was nice to access.
reviews.title: much better the second time around

reviews.text: My husband and I had a complimentary stay at the Sheraton Gateway due to a negative experience the previous year. The manager at the time was very kind and sent us the coupon for a free stay. She put us intouch with the new manager and the certificate was honoured.
reviews.title: Great and convenient stay!

reviews.text: Checkin was fast, no line-up, excellent service, fresh fruit and flavoured water available in the lobby, nice touch. Our room was opposite side of airport so no tram noise this time and we had an exceptionally large room, (may have been disability room). It was clean, & the bed was a large king and comfortable.
reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better hotel airport!

reviews.text: We had asked for a wake-up call for 3:30 am, but luckily I set the alarm. There was Starbucks in the room which we made in the morning and took with us. Air Transat was literally steps away, never had to get on the tram or step outside.
reviews.title: Excellent location for early start

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I have been staying at the Sheraton Gateway Terminal Three Hotel one night prior to our vacation as a vacation tradition for many years now. From the moment we arrive we feel like our vacation begins. We are Club Lounge guests and it is positively heavenly!
reviews.title: Never disappoints!
Nice hotel, convenient location
reviews.text: Ask to face the runway....fun to watch the planes coming in yet not hear them...great soundproofing throughout the hotel!

The staff are always top notch and make us feel like valued returning guests. I can't say enough about this location and we hope to continue our tradition for years to come. Our next stay is booked for July 2013....you can't go wrong with a stay here!
reviews.title: Great for early morning flights

reviews.text: Thank you Gateway! Keep up the great work!
reviews.title: Love this place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will stay her again forsure, even having 4-6 hours between flights its a great place to take a nap. Hotel room was nice, lean, and roomy. The resturant was good but pricey. The shuttle running between terminals makes this even more convenient, only minutes away from terminal 1 on a free shuttle.
reviews.title: Excellent for Pre-Vacation Stay

description: The only hotel located inside Toronto's International Airport. It's the perfect choice for comfort and convenience.
